amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to develop and implement a plan to monitor the compliance of the Department of Housing and Urban Development with current employer relocation restrictions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2846 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11404-11405) To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to develop and implement a plan to monitor the compliance of the Department of Housing and Urban Development with current employer relocation restrictions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2846 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2846 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dorgan.
